bibl.title: The Fragmentary Homeric Hymn to Dionysus.
bibl.note: The Geneva Papyrus, P. Gen. Inv. 432 [ed.: André HURST, Un nouveau papyrus du premier hymne homérique: le papyrus de Genève 432 (2ème - 1er siècle avant notre ère), Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 317-321 et pll. 27-28.]. - The myth: Dionysus and Hephaestus [including a discussion of P. Oxy. IV, 670 (= Pack2 1860)]. - Other fragments? - The close of the hymn. - Edition of the fragments. - P. 11: Addendum.
